00121         $strHtml .= $this->showHeaders();

00133     protected function showHeaders()
00134     {
00135         if( $this->objXmlSequence->getCallerPath() != null and $this->objXmlSequence->getPublicPath() != null )
00136         {
00137             $strPublicPath = CorujaFileManipulation::getRelativePath( $this->objXmlSequence->getCallerPath(), $this->objXmlSequence->getPublicPath() );
00138         }
00139         elseif( $this->objXmlSequence->getCallerPath() == null and $this->objXmlSequence->getPublicPath() != null )
00140         {
00141             $strPublicPath = $this->objXmlSequence->getPublicPath();
00142         }
00143         else
00144         {
00145             $strPublicPath = "./";
00146         }
00147 
00148         $intQtdActors = sizeof( $this->objXmlSequence->getActors() );
00149         $intQtdMessages = $intQtdActors + 1;
00150         $intBodyWidth =
00151             ( $this->intMessageWidth * $intQtdMessages * $this->intZoom / 100 )
00152             +
00153             ( 100 * $intQtdActors * $this->intZoom / 100 );
00154 
00155         $intFont = ( $this->intFont + round( $this->intFont * $this->intZoom / 100 ) ) / 2;
00156         $intMessageWidth = round( $this->intMessageWidth * $this->intZoom / 100 );
00157 
00158         $intMessageHeight = max( 40 ,  round( 40 * $this->intZoom / 100 ) );
00159         $strHtmlHeaders =
00160 <<<HTML
00161             <style>
00162                 @import "{$strPublicPath}css/sequenceStyle.css";
00163                 .sequenceDiagram
00164                 {
00165                     width: {$intBodyWidth}px;
00166                 }
00167                 .row
00168                 {
00169                     height:{$intMessageHeight}px;
00170                     width: {$intMessageWidth}px;
00171                     font-size: {$intFont};
00172                 }
00173                 .row span
00174                 {
00175                     height: 50%;
00176                 }
00177                 .actor .name
00178                 {
00179                     height:{$intMessageHeight}px;
00180                 }
00181             </style>
00182             <div class='sequenceDiagram'>
00183 HTML;
00184         return $strHtmlHeaders;
00185     }

00210 HTML;

00214         foreach( $arrActors as $objActor )
00215         {
00220             $arrActorName = explode( ":" , $objActor->getName() );
00221 
00222             $strClass = array_pop( $arrActorName );
00223             array_push( $arrActorName , '<strong>' . $strClass . '</strong>' );
00224 
00225             $strActorName = implode( " : " , $arrActorName );
00226

00228 <<<HTML

00230                 <div class="message">
00231                     <span>&nbsp;</span>
00232                 </div>

00235                 <div class="name">

00237                 </div>
00238             </div>
00239 HTML;
00240          }

00242         $strHtmlActors .=
00243 <<<HTML
00244     </div>

00256     protected function showMessages()
00257     {
00258         $strHtmlMessages = '';
00259 
00260         $arrMessages = $this->objXmlSequence->getMessages();
00261         
00262         foreach( $arrMessages as $intKey => $objMessage )
00263         {
00264             $intPos = $intKey + 1;
00265 
00269             if( $objMessage->isReverse() )
00270             {
00271                 $intStart = $objMessage->getActorTo()->getId();
00272                 $intEnd = $objMessage->getActorFrom()->getId();
00273             }
00274             else
00275             {
00276                 $intEnd = $objMessage->getActorTo()->getId();
00277                 $intStart = $objMessage->getActorFrom()->getId();
00278             }
00279 
00280 $strHtmlMessages .=
00281 <<<HTML
00282             <div class="line body">
00283                   <div class="row " >
00284                     <div class="message ">
00285                       <span>&nbsp;</span>
00286                     </div>
00287                   </div>
00288 HTML;
00289             $arrActors = $this->objXmlSequence->getActors();
00290 
00291             $strReverse = $objMessage->isReverse() ? 'reverse' : 'regular';
00292             $strLarge = $objMessage->isLarge() ? 'large' : 'short';
00293             $strRecursive = $objMessage->isRecursive() ? 'recursive' : 'line';
00294 
00295 
00296             while( $objActorActual = array_shift( $arrActors ) )
00297             {
00298                 $objActorNext = current( $arrActors );
00299 
00300                 if( $objActorNext == false )
00301                 {
00302                     $objActorNext = new XmlSequenceActor();
00303                     $objActorNext->setId( $objActorActual->getId() + 1 );
00304                 }
00310                if( $objActorActual->getId() < $intStart )
00311                {
00312                    // before line //
00313                     $strHtmlMessages .=
00314 <<<HTML
00315 
00316                   <div class="actor">
00317                     <div class="name">
00318                       <span title="{$objActorActual->getName()}">&nbsp;</span>
00319                     </div>
00320                   </div>
00321 
00322                   <div class="row">
00323                     <div class="message">
00324                       <span>&nbsp;</span>
00325                     </div>
00326                   </div>
00327 HTML;
00328                }
00329                elseif( $objActorActual->getId() == $intStart )
00330                {
00331                    // start line //
00332                     $strHtmlMessages .=
00333 <<<HTML
00334                   <div class="actor start">
00335                     <div class="name">
00336                       <span title="{$objActorActual->getName()}">&nbsp;</span>
00337                     </div>
00338                   </div>
00339 
00340                   <div class="row {$objMessage->getType()} {$strReverse} {$strLarge} {$strRecursive} start ">
00341                     <div class="message ">
00342                       <span><strong>{$intPos}</strong>. {$objMessage->getText()}</span>
00343                     {$this->showValues( $objMessage )}
00344                     </div>
00345                   </div>
00346 HTML;
00347                }
00348                elseif( ( $objActorActual->getId() > $intStart ) and ($objActorNext->getId() < $intEnd ) )
00349                {
00350                    // inside line //
00351                     $strHtmlMessages .=
00352 <<<HTML
00353                   <div class="actor middle {$objMessage->getType()}">
00354                     <div class="name">
00355                       <span title="{$objActorActual->getName()}">&nbsp;</span>
00356                     </div>
00357                   </div>
00358 
00359                   <div class="row {$objMessage->getType()} {$strReverse} {$strLarge} middle ">
00360                     <div class="message">
00361                       <span>&nbsp;</span>
00362                     </div>
00363                   </div>
00364 HTML;
00365                }
00366                elseif( $objActorNext->getId() == $intEnd )
00367                {
00368                     $strHtmlMessages .=
00369 <<<HTML
00370                   <div class="actor end {$objMessage->getType()}">
00371                     <div class="name">
00372                       <span title="{$objActorActual->getName()}">&nbsp;</span>
00373                     </div>
00374                   </div>
00375 
00376                   <div class="row {$objMessage->getType()} {$strReverse}  end ">
00377                     <div class="message ">
00378                       <span>&nbsp;</span>
00379                     </div>
00380                   </div>
00381 HTML;
00382                }
00383                elseif( $objActorNext->getId() > $intEnd )
00384                {
00385                    $intDif = $objActorNext->getId() - $intEnd;
00386                     $strHtmlMessages .=
00387 <<<HTML
00388                   <div class="actor after{$intDif}">
00389                     <div class="name">
00390                       <span title="{$objActorActual->getName()}">&nbsp;</span>
00391                     </div>
00392                   </div>
00393 
00394                   <div class="row">
00395                     <div class="message">
00396                       <span>&nbsp;</span>
00397                     </div>
00398                   </div>
00399 HTML;
00400                }
00401                else
00402                {
00403                    $strMessage = '';
00404                    $strMessage .= ' Invalid Id ' . "\n" ;
00405                    $strMessage .= ' Actual Actor ' . $objActorActual->getId() ;
00406                    $strMessage .= ' Next Actor ' . $objActorNext->getId() ;
00407                    $strMessage .= ' Message Start ' . $intStart ;
00408                    $strMessage .= ' Message End' . $intEnd ;
00409                    throw new Exception( $strMessage );
00410                }
00411             }
00412 
00413         $strHtmlMessages .=
00414 <<<HTML
00415             </div>
00416 HTML;
00417 
00418         }
00419 
00420         return $strHtmlMessages;
00421     }

00430     public function showValues( XmlSequenceMessage $objXmlMessage )
00431     {
00432         $arrValues = $objXmlMessage->getValues();
00433         if( sizeof( $arrValues ) > 0 )
00434         {
00435             $strHtml = '<div class="parameters">';
00436             $strHtml .= '<ul>' . "\n";
00437 
00438             foreach( $arrValues as $objValue )
00439             {
00440                 $strHtml .= '<li>' . "\n";
00441                 $strHtml .= '   <strong>' . $objValue->getName() . '</strong>' . "\n";
00442                 $strHtml .= '   ' . $objValue->getValue() . ' ' . "\n";
00443                 $strHtml .= '</li>' . "\n";
00444 
00445             }
00446 
00447             $strHtml .= '</ul></div>' . "\n";
00448         }
00449         else
00450         {
00451             $strHtml = '';
00452         }
00453         return $strHtml;
00454     }
